concept.label: first-question
concept.phrase: Why did you do "%i%" here?
Why did you perform "%i%" here?
Please explain why you applied "%i%" here?
What part of the equation made you apply "%i%" now?
What part of the equation inspired you to apply "%i%" here?
What made you choose "%i%" as the correct step?
Among subtract/add/divide/multiply, why did you choose "%i_opr%" here?
How did you know we should %i_opr% "%i_op%" and not something else?

concept.label: R2Y-response-simst
concept.phrase: Fantastic! Thanks!
That's a helpful response. Thanks!
Perfect! You are one of the best teachers I had so far!
You're a fantastic teacher!
Makes perfect sense to me. Thank you!
Genius! That helped a lot!
Sweet! Explanation right on spot!
Thanks for explaining using the key terms. That’s very helpful!
What a smart teacher I have! Thanks for explaining it so clearly!
You are really good at explaining things to me!
Thanks for caring about my learning. Your explanations are quite helpful!

concept.label: R2N-response-simst
concept.phrase: Using the key terms in the Unit Overview tab, can you explain why you %i_opr%ed "%i_op%" here and not something else?
I understand what you said, but for this equation only. Can you explain when does %i% work in general using the key terms from the Unit Overview tab?
Can you explain what features in an equation make "%i_opr%" as the best way to go using the key terms from the Unit Overview tab?
What you said looks very specific to the current equation only. I was wondering if you can explain when "%i_opr%" is the best way to go in general using the key terms from the Unit Overview tab?
I understand what you meant, but for this equation only. Can you explain why "%i%" works in general using the key terms in the Unit Overview tab?

concept.label: R1Y-response-simst
concept.phrase: Thanks for describing it so thoughtfully!
Thanks for the witty response!
Thanks for explaining it to me so wisely!
Your explanation was right on spot!

concept.label: R1N-response-simst
concept.phrase: Please explain what went wrong using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab.
How did you figure out that something went wrong? Please explain using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab.
Please explain what went wrong using the key terms from the Unit Overview tab.
Please describe what went wrong using the key terms from the Unit Overview tab.

concept.label: R0-response-simst
concept.phrase: I am trying to understand what makes "%i%" correct in depth. Would you please explain using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab?
Using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab, explain why you chose "%i_opr%" and not any other transformations?
I attempt to learn things deeply so that I can solve any equation. Using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab, explain what makes "%i%" correct at this point of equation?
I want to strengthen my basic understanding. What motivated you to demonstrate "%i%"? Please explain using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab.
Using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab, explain what motivated you to demonstrate "%i%"?
Using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab, explain why did you perform "%i%" here?

concept.label: R0-response-simst-2
concept.phrase: Can you explain why "%i%" is your first guess using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab?
Today is my day to learn from you. Can you explain why "%i%" is your first guess using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab?

concept.label: move-on
concept.phrase: Hmm...I will get back to it later again. Let’s move on for now!
Umm...I am not very sure if I understand your explanation correctly. I will get back to it later again. Let’s move on now!
Although I am not convinced yet, let’s move on for now!
Hmm..I still have some confusions, I will get back to it later again. Let’s move on for now!
Umm..I did not quite get what you said but let me move on for now! I will get back to it later again.

concept.label: rephrase
concept.phrase: I did not get that. Can you please rephrase what you said?
That was hard to understand. Can you please rephrase what you said?
I'm afraid I don't follow you. Can you please rephrase what you said?
Sorry, I didn't catch that. Would you mind rephrasing what you said?
That was all Greek to me. Can you please rephrase what you said?

concept.label: unanticipated-response
concept.phrase: anything else
